name: Invoices by Customer
query:
select posting_Date "Date:Date:100", CONCAT_WS(' Amount ',ts.name,round(ts.grand_total,2)) "Invoice Desc:Data:100", group_concat(tsi.item_code,', ',round(tsi.qty,0),' @ ',round(tsi.net_rate,2), ' = ',round(tsi.amount,2) order by tsi.idx SEPARATOR '
') "Invoice Items:Data:100", group_concat(distinct tac.description, ' = ' , round(tac.tax_amount,2)) "Invoice Tax:Data:100", outstanding_amount "Outstanding:Currency:100", @sum := @sum + outstanding_amount "Balance:Currency:100" from `tabSales Invoice` ts inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` tsi on ts.name=tsi.parent left join `tabSales Taxes and Charges` tac on ts.name=tac.parent join ( select @sum:=0 ) as tx where ts.grand_total-1 > ts.paid_amount and ts.outstanding_amount >0 and ts.docstatus=1 and ts.customer = %(customer)s and ts.company = %(company)s group by ts.name order by ts.name
